title: Dreams (Fleetwood Mac song)
summary: "Dreams" is a song by British-American rock band Fleetwood Mac from their eleventh studio album Rumours (1977). In the United States, "Dreams" was released as the second single from Rumours on 24 March 1977, while in the United Kingdom, the song was released as the third single in June 1977.[2] A stage performance of "Dreams" was used as the promotional music video.
